attributes.action: Make HMRC levy tax evasion charges on guity MP's for capital gains tax evasion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned request that the Prime Minister instruct Her Majesty's Revenue & Customs to initiate ,  investigate and as appropriate press charges on guilty MP's for capital gains tax evasion in relation to "flipping" their second homes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
